hero.title: Positano to Ravello – via Amalfi by Bus
hero.description: Travel from Positano to Ravello with a simple change in Amalfi. This guide covers where to buy SITA tickets, how to read the timetable, and what to expect when changing in Amalfi — plus how to reach the Positano bus stop from Hostel Brikette.

journey.title: Journey overview
journey.body: Expect roughly 1.5–2.5 hours depending on connections. First take the SITA bus from Positano (Chiesa Nuova) to Amalfi, then transfer to a SITA bus bound for Ravello.

sita.title: SITA buses and tickets
items: Buses along the Amalfi Coast are operated by SITA (SITA Sud Srl).
Buy tickets at newsstands or tobacco shops (tabacchi) before boarding.
Have your ticket ready; drivers validate/stamp or tear your ticket on boarding.
Expect crowds in high season; arrive a little early to queue.

Travel Monday to Saturday? Use columns 'F' and 'G'.

positanoStop.title: Positano (Chiesa Nuova) bus stop
items: The closest SITA stop is Positano (Chiesa Nuova) on Via G. Marconi.
It sits about 140 metres (490 feet) from the hostel entrance.
You will wait outside the cafe/bar called 'Bar Internazionale'.
positanoStop.caption: Arrive a few minutes early to secure a seat; buses can fill quickly in summer.
positanoStop.alt: Positano's Chiesa Nuova SITA stop outside Bar Internazionale

walk.title: Walk from the hostel to the stop
items: Exit the hostel, walk down the steps to the main road, and turn left.
Continue along Via G. Marconi for roughly 100 metres (330 feet).
Bar Internazionale will be on your left; the SITA stop is right outside.

buyTickets.title: Buy bus tickets
items: Buy tickets inside Bar Internazionale or a nearby tabacchi.
You will need tickets that cover: Positano → Amalfi and Amalfi → Ravello.
You may be sold one or two tickets depending on the fare product available.

toAmalfi.title: Take the bus to Amalfi
items: Cross over the road from Bar Internazionale to the Amalfi-bound stop.
Queue and board the bus signed for Amalfi; validate your ticket.
Alight at Amalfi's bus station for your connection to Ravello.

change.title: Change in Amalfi
items: You can briefly visit Amalfi while waiting for the next bus.
Return to the bus station area to board a bus to Ravello (routes 5110/5120).
Validate your second ticket on boarding.

arrive.title: Arriving in Ravello
items: Ravello sits above Amalfi; many sights cluster around Piazza Duomo.
Follow local signage to your accommodation or main square.
For late arrivals, consider a taxi from Amalfi if connections are sparse.
